english.segment1: I'm tired of your open mouth. Crawling inside my skin. Had this plan we'd never quit. The fight within the courts begun. Sayin it's too late. When a man's gotta be
english.segment2: Forget that your tired with. Replace it with we never will. Beyond the facts they're in your face. Know the facts beyond your nose. Sayin it's too late. When a man's gotta be
english.segment4: Run without wings. No responsible feelings
